title: Get Special Xayah and Rakan Icons When They Launch

replies.body: When you don't have any friend so you gift your smurf account :)
Hello fellow Dark friend, I could use a champ :^)
Will there still be a skin+champ bundle for the separate champs?
Yes! There will be individual bundles for Xaya and Rakan and their respective cosmic skin, as well as a larger bundle including both champions and their skins.

There seems to be an error with the gifting. My friends and I are all having trouble gifting Xayah AND Rakan, getting a mix of these two errors: "your friend's gift pool is not large enough to receive a mystery gift" and "purchase.account.transactionInProgress". We tried relogging, thinking perhaps the client was just being screwy since we were all logged in already when they became available, but the errors persisted. Every single one of us (6 of us) is having this issue.
Working now! They show up as 'undefined' but they definitely work!
Yup! We've escalated the issue to Riot, and they're working on a resolution to the 'undefined' message when sending a gift. Thanks for the report!
ooo Icons....but unfortunately I have no friends that I like that much {{item:3070}}

RIOT WHYYYYYY. 
I save up for Xayah and get 8k IP.
My friend says he'll save up for Rakan and instantly blows all his IP on champion shards so he can get mastery level 7.
Now you're trying to force my hand with a free summoner icon...
I'll trade with you I transfered my account to OCE and I have no friends here{{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}

dw i live in oce and when i began lol i had a accout called ultimate12334
(btw this account is also called ultimte12334)
hey wanna duo sometime ill be your friend
yes{{summoner:31}}
hey sorry i just woke up ill add you right now
Riot! You make everything funner than it could be! I love you!!!!

I played multiple games with a xayah and rakan on my team within the time period but I still didn't get the 'blazing feather' icon...
Will I still get it or no? :(
RITOOOO!! T_T :((
I'm assuming not T_T
Hey, what if the {{champion:498}} (I play {{champion:497}} ) leaves one of the matches? Do I still get the icon?
If we buy a bundle and gift it to someone, will we still get the icon? Or is it just the champ?
Bundles are unfortunately not able to be gifted at this time. Sorry about that!
Hello. I completed the two games. Just wondering when we can expect the icons?
Icons may take up to two weeks after the event ends to appear in your account. Hang tight!

still haven't received the icons...

I've gifted to my friend, and he gifted to me. I've played several games with both Xayah and Rakan, did the combined recall, won and lost... still, no icons.

Additionally, I still haven't received the Demacia icon from the promo. :/

Pretty. Annoyed. Riot.

The distribution for the Demacia Icon should now be completed. If you don't have it yet, you should contact Riot Games Player Support via ticket to check up on that. With regards to the Xayah/Rakan icons for this event, distribution is still on-going, and it may take up to 2 weeks after the event is over for the icon to appear in your account.
Only started playing league two months ago so I got no IP for the support, anyone wanna help a brother out? Ty ty xx
Are you still able to obtain the icons if you have gifted either champion with RP?

Yup! 
> Unlike other champs, Xayah and Rakan can be gifted using IP between April 19-26! Gift Xayah or Rakan to a friend for just 6300 IP (normally 7800 IP) and unlock an exclusive Summoner Icon for yourself **(also works if you gift using RP)**.

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/champion-release/xayah-and-rakan-available-now-launch-promotions
Well thanks for that, apparently I cant read lol
That's what I'm here for ;)
Double IP weekend begins on April 21 at 17:01 AEST!
I gifted a friend 20 minutes before 1:05 on april 20th does this mean I won't be eligible for the icon :/?
If you don't receive the icon within 96 hours, submit a ticket to Player Support and they may grant it manually, given the circumstances.
Are they being released at 12:01 tomorrow morning (in an hour)?
They're live now!
I think they mean 1am
Can you gift the same person with both champs?
Indeed, you can!
so they will be out at 1:05am then
Get a life you dirty Challenger {{champion:11}} Main
Anyone up for trading Xayah/Rakan for icons feel free to add me (I REALLY want to play Xayah). Only got enough IP for one, though, so first in, best dressed (pun totally intended).
Hey which time zone are these times on?
if you guys don't have anyone to gift please gift me <3.
If we buy the champs could we still get the gift of magic icon?
between 1:05 April 20 and 16:59 April 27 AEST? They wont be out until tomorrow? -.-
